text: Visiting Cleveland and found this spot to have the best hookah by far. I visited 3-4 other places near by but was dissapointed.  They also have a pool table, cool place, check it out.
Open till 4am on the weekends. Great hookah flavors (red bull & the house blend). They also offer a hookah with a pineapple head that serves as the tobacco chamber which is sooo tasty.

the place is a small step up fron all the local hookah bars as of decore. there hookahs are the best ive tased lets not ofrget very clean. the staff and owner are very freindly and welcoming. go earlly if u dont like loud music causee they have a DJ at night.
